fn.p: I have read the journal's policy and the authors of this manuscript have the following competing interests: ARG is a retired, former pharmaceutical industry executive and is currently on the Board of, and owns stock in, Biothera Pharmaceuticals Inc. AG is a Corporate Vice President and full-time employee of Parexel, a privately owned Clinical Research Organization supporting drug development in the biopharmaceutical industry through management of clinical trials, regulatory consulting, and other services. He owns stock in a number of pharmaceutical companies. LL is a full-time employee of the Centre for Innovation in Regulatory Science serving as the Head, Regulatory Collaborations. CIRS, a subsidiary of the Clarivate Analytics group, provides an international forum to develop regulatory and reimbursement policy. He serves as a volunteer Board member of the Erudee Foundation, a US-based nonprofit in the education sector. JCWL is a Registrar of the Singapore National Registry of Diseases and Board Chairman of the Singapore Clinical Research Institute and National Health Innovation Centre, a not-for-profit public sector academic research and translational funding organisation. He is an appointed Board member of the Singapore Food Agency, a government statutory board, and an elected Board member of St Andrew’s Mission Hospital, a faith-based charity. TS is the sole owner of Consilium Sweden AB, which supports drug development in the biopharmaceutical industry through regulatory consulting and strategic advice. HU is a Corporate Senior Vice President, Global Head for Global Regulatory Affairs and Global Quality and full-time employee of Otsuka Pharmaceuticals Company. She owns stock in a number of pharmaceutical companies.
¶Alexander R. Giaquinto is a Retired Pharmaceutical Executive (Merck).
